name: 1 week 1 hour game jams - Survival
description:
This game is developed in 1 hour for a "1 week 1-hour game jam" challenge. This day's theme was survival.

Move with WASD or arrow keys. Aim with the mouse and shoot with left click. Collect as many coins as possible to get a good high score. The high score gets saved between your plays. Survive 1 minute and don't get caught by your enemies!
